sub_fields.label: Bearer Token
sub_fields.name: bearer_token
sub_fields.instructions: This token is used to authorize the SPOT API request.

fields.label: Featured Resource?
fields.name: featured_resource
fields.instructions: If selected, this will display as a featured resource on the topics pages.

fields.label: GA Intro Alternate Text
fields.name: ga_intro_alternate_text
fields.instructions: This text shwos when the "Try another search" text appears above the GA search input box.

fields.label: Image
fields.name: image
fields.instructions: This image will appear to the left of the CTA content.

fields.label: Ranking
fields.name: ranking
fields.instructions: Higher rankings make the current GA appear higher in the lists in the 'Browse GAs' section.

fields.label: Emergency Phone Number
fields.name: emergency_phone_number
fields.instructions: This phone number appears in the emergency phone number block.

fields.label: Legal Server Resource API Domain
fields.name: legal_server_resource_api_domain
fields.instructions: This is the domain associated with the current states Legal Server instance, if applicable.

fields.label: Topic Page Callout
fields.name: topic_page_callout
fields.instructions: This callout shows below the resource tabs on single topic pages.

fields.label: GA List Ranking (GA Resource Type Only)
fields.name: ga_list_ranking
fields.instructions: Higher rankings make the current GA appear first in the GA lists on the GA page.

fields.label: Show Court Lookup?
fields.name: show_court_lookup
fields.instructions: This will display the court case lookup for the selected state at the bottom of the page.

fields.label: Hide Topic
fields.name: topic_hidden
fields.instructions: This determines if the topic is hidden in the topic browser section of the site.

fields.label: Icon
fields.name: icon
fields.instructions: Icon shown if topic is a parent topic.
